Name: Skeleton Lord
Languages: the languages it knew in life
Traits: Skeleton Cloak. The skeleton lord has a cloak made up of 2d4 + 2 skeletons. While attached to the cloak, these skeletons are considered a part of the skeleton lord. When the skeleton lord takes damage, roll a 1d6. On a 6, one of the skeletons is knocked free from the cloak, landing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the skeleton lord and acting immediately after it in the initiative order. The skeleton acts as an ally of the skeleton lord but isn't under its direct control.
Actions: Multiattack. The skeleton lord makes two bone greatsword attacks. Skeleton Toss. Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target.
